item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Akshay Kumar and Priyadarshan’s Bhooth Bangla has a strong Bhool Bhulaiyaa connect – Here’s how - PINKVILLA
item.description:
EXCLUSIVE: Akshay Kumar and Priyadarshan’s Bhooth Bangla has a strong Bhool Bhulaiyaa connect – Here’s how

Published on: Jan 07, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

The upcoming film Bhooth Bangla connects back to the cult classic Bhool Bhulaiyaa featuring Akshay Kumar and Priyadarshan. The filming commenced in Jaipur, bringing back the original team to the same location used for Bhool Bhulaiyaa after 18 years.

  • 18 years after Bhool Bhulaiyaa, the duo reunites for Bhooth Bangla.
  • Filming takes place primarily at Chomu Palace in Jaipur, similar to the original.
  • The film is touted as a blend of horror and comedy, featuring a significant VFX component.
  • It includes an ensemble cast with Akshay Kumar, Wamiqa Gabbi, Tabu, and others.
  • Bhooth Bangla is set to release in April 2026.
“The team is thrilled to be shooting at the same spot after 18 long years,” revealed a source close to the development.

The return of Kumar to this film genre marks an exciting development for fans of horror-comedy in Indian cinema.

item.title: Unstoppable with NBK: Ram Charan reveals his favorite actress - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan Reveals His Favorite Actress on Unstoppable with NBK

Publication Date: January 7, 2025 Source: 123Telugu

Global star Ram Charan's special episode on Unstoppable with NBK Season 4 is highly anticipated, where he discusses his personal life and film career.

  • Ram Charan selected Samantha Ruth Prabhu as his favorite actress among Kiara Advani and Alia Bhatt.
  • The episode promises fun and candid conversations under the hosting of Balakrishna.
  • Premieres on January 8, 2025, at 7 PM on Aha.
“Packed with heartfelt moments and engaging conversations.”

Stay tuned for the episode's airing for more exclusive insights.

item.title: Ram Charan, Pawan Kalyan offer 20 lakh to families of 2 fans who died while returning from Game Changer event - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ram Charan, Pawan Kalyan offer ₹20 lakh to families of 2 fans who died while returning from Game Changer event

Date: January 07, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Two fans returning from the pre-release event of Game Changer tragically died in an accident. In response, Ram Charan and Pawan Kalyan have offered financial support to their families.

  • Aarava Manikanta and Thokada Charan died in a road accident after attending the Game Changer event in Rajahmundry.
  • Both actors pledged ₹20 lakh to the families, alongside additional support from producer Dil Raju.
  • Pawan Kalyan criticized past governance for neglecting the road where the accident occurred.
  • Dil Raju expressed regret over the incident, emphasizing the importance of fan safety during events.
“It’s unfortunate when such incidents happen during such happy moments; it’s painful. My condolences to the families.” - Dil Raju

This incident highlights the unexpected tragedies that can occur during celebration events, prompting calls for better safety measures.

item.title: Tom Holland won't ‘rush a wedding’ with Zendaya post engagement; he always knew 'she was the one' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Tom Holland won't ‘rush a wedding’ with Zendaya post engagement; he always knew 'she was the one'

Date: Jan 07, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Tom Holland and Zendaya have gotten engaged, as confirmed by an insider, although the couple has not discussed their plans publicly. The engagement follows years of dating after meeting on the set of Spider-Man: Far from Home.

  • Zendaya was spotted with a large diamond ring at the Golden Globes.
  • Tom expressed he had long wanted to propose, having always known Zendaya was special to him.
  • Reports indicate the couple will take their time planning a wedding due to their busy schedules.
  • Details of their relationship have been closely followed since they began dating.
“He's always been crazy about her. He always knew she was the one. They have something very special.”

While the couple enjoys their engagement, they are focused on their respective careers, with upcoming projects including Spider-Man 4 and a new film directed by Christopher Nolan.

item.title: Taarak Mehta fame Gurucharan Singh shares video from hospital; says ‘Halat bahut kharab hogayi thi…’ - The Times of India
item.description:
Taarak Mehta Fame Gurucharan Singh Shares Hospital Video

Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

Gurucharan Singh, known for his role in Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah, has shared a heartfelt video from the hospital where he expressed his struggles during a difficult time in his health.

  • He revealed that his condition was very serious, stating, 'Halat bahut kharab hogayi thi.'
  • The video serves as a personal update for fans who have been concerned about his well-being.
  • Fans have shown immense support and concern through social media channels.
“Halat bahut kharab hogayi thi…” - Gurucharan Singh

This video highlights not only the actor's health challenges but also the importance of the support system around him as he navigates through his recovery.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 33: Allu Arjun film’s chances of dethroning Dangal now slim - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection day 33: Allu Arjun film’s chances of dethroning Dangal now slim

Date: Jan 07, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Pushpa 2 has experienced a notable slowdown in box office collections five weeks post-release, struggling to surpass the record set by Dangal.

  • The film saw a 65.28% drop in collections, earning ₹2.5 crore on day 33.
  • Total collections in India amount to ₹1208.7 crore net and ₹1441 crore gross.
  • Pushpa 2 has set records, previously beating Baahubali 2.
  • To surpass Dangal, the film must collect ₹239 crore more, which seems unlikely without additional marketing.
“We might not beat Dangal's worldwide record.”

Despite breaking several records, the diminishing box office returns present challenges for Pushpa 2 in its quest for the top spot.

item.title: Salman Khan Gets His Balcony Covered With Bullet Proof Glass Amid Threats; Video Goes Viral - News18
item.description:
Salman Khan Gets His Balcony Covered With Bullet Proof Glass Amid Threats; Video Goes Viral

Date: January 07, 2025

Source: News18

Salman Khan has upgraded security at his residence due to ongoing threats to his life. His balcony is now protected by bullet proof glass following previous gunfire incidents linked to a local gang.

  • Recent threats from Lawrence Bishnoi’s gang have prompted the installation of bullet proof glass at Salman Khan’s Galaxy Apartments.
  • In April 2024, gunshots were reported outside his residence, attributed to the Bishnoi gang.
  • The gang has allegedly demanded a ransom of Rs 5 crore for Khan’s safety.
  • Along with the glass installation, Khan has also acquired a bulletproof SUV and increased armed security.
  • Salman Khan is set to release a new film titled Sikandar in Eid 2025.
"If the demand isn’t met, he would suffer a fate worse than Baba Siddique," highlighting the severity of the threats faced by Khan.

In conclusion, the recent series of threats and violent incidents has led Salman Khan to significantly strengthen his personal security measures, underscoring the risks associated with his celebrity status.

item.title: His favourite actor Allu Arjun beside him, 9-year-old injured in stampede remains unconscious - The Indian Express
item.description:
Allu Arjun Visits Injured Boy in Hospital Following Stampede Incident

Publication Date: January 6, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

Tollywood actor Allu Arjun visited a nine-year-old boy receiving treatment after a stampede during the premiere of Pushpa 2. The boy is in critical condition, and his mother tragically died in the incident.

  • Arjun had to postpone his first visit to the boy due to police concerns regarding public interest.
  • The boy's condition is slowly improving, though he remains unconscious.
  • Doctors are cautiously optimistic about the boy's vital signs.
  • Arjun expressed his condolences to the boy’s father and offered support.
“He has remained afebrile for the last few days... his agitative episodes and dystonia have reduced but are still present.” - Dr. Chetan R Mundada

Arjun's visit aims to provide emotional support during a difficult time for the family following the tragic stampede incident.

item.title: Game Changer is a Sure Shot Blockbuster Says Chiranjeevi - TrackTollywood
item.description:
Chiranjeevi Predicts Game Changer as a Blockbuster

Publication Date: Unknown | Source: Track Tollywood

In his recent remarks, Megastar Chiranjeevi expressed strong confidence in the success of his son’s film, Game Changer, calling it a sure-shot blockbuster after watching it twice.

  • Chiranjeevi believes the film will perform well at the box office, showcasing his knack for predicting successful films.
  • Director Sukumar confirmed that Chiranjeevi watched the film with him and offered enthusiastic feedback.
  • Chiranjeevi praised the emotional depth and the second half of the film.
  • His confidence is seen as a morale booster for both the film team and its fans.
“Game Changer is a sure-shot blockbuster,” said Chiranjeevi.

This affirmation from Chiranjeevi is expected to elevate expectations within the film industry and among fans alike.

item.title: Oscars 2025: Suriya’s ‘Kanguva’ joins 6 other Indian films in the contenders’ list, fans surprised - The Hindu
item.description:
Oscars 2025: Suriya’s ‘Kanguva’ joins 6 other Indian films in the contenders’ list, fans surprised

Date: January 07, 2025

Source: The Hindu

Suriya’s big-budget film Kanguva, which opened to mixed responses after its release on November 14, 2024, has made it to the contenders list of Oscars 2025. Directed by Siva, the movie is an action adventure also starring Bobby Deol and Disha Patani.

  • Despite mixed reviews, Suriya's performance in Kanguva received praise, while many criticized the film's execution.
  • Jyothika, Suriya’s wife, commented that the negative reactions felt like propaganda.
  • In addition to Kanguva, other Indian films in the running include Girls will be Girls, Santosh, Swatantrya Veer Savarkar, All We Imagine as Light, Putul, and Aadujeevitham: The Goat Life.
  • The voting for nominations will occur from January 8 to January 12, 2025, with the final list announced on January 17, 2025.
“The Oscars will be held on March 02, 2025, at the Dolby Theatre in Ovation Hollywood.”

In brief, Suriya's Kanguva has captivated fans and made waves by joining the contenders for the Oscars 2025, despite mixed reviews.

item.title: Ram Kapoor’s Incredible 55-Kilo Weight Loss: A Journey of Dedication and Transformation - News18
item.description:
Ram Kapoor’s Incredible 55-Kilo Weight Loss: A Journey of Dedication and Transformation

Date: January 07, 2025

Source: News18

Television star Ram Kapoor has inspired many with his remarkable weight transformation journey. After shedding 55 kilos in a year, he shared insights into the challenges and strategies he employed to achieve this change.

  • Ram Kapoor lost weight from 140 kg to 85 kg in just one year.
  • His journey included ups and downs, with a cycle of losing and regaining weight over five years.
  • He emphasized the importance of a disciplined diet, adopting intermittent fasting, and eating two meals a day without snacking.
  • He dedicated 90 minutes daily for exercise, splitting time between cardio and strength training.
  • Ram denied using Ozempic or undergoing bariatric surgery, emphasizing personal commitment to health.
“I decided to fully commit to becoming the best version of myself.” - Ram Kapoor

Ram Kapoor’s story highlights the power of determination and consistency in achieving health and fitness goals.

item.title: Suriya-Bobby Deol's box-office bomb Kanguva enters Oscars 2025 race with Girls will be Girls, All We Imagine as Light - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Suriya and Bobby Deol-starrer Kanguva, one of the biggest box-office failures of 2024, is a top contender at Oscars 2025

Date: Jan 07, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

One of the most awaited Indian films of 2024 was Siruthai Siva’s directorial Kanguva. Although it underperformed at the box office, it has surprisingly entered the Oscars 2025 race.

  • Despite significant expectations, Kanguva earned only ₹106 crore against its ₹300-350 crore budget.
  • Kanguva is competing for the Oscars against critically acclaimed films like Girls Will Be Girls and All We Imagine as Light.
  • Out of 323 eligible films for the 97th Academy Awards, 6 are Indian, including Kanguva.
“Why has Kanguva, a box-office bomb, made it to this esteemed list?”

The news has sparked curiosity among netizens questioning Kanguva's nomination considering its commercial failure.

item.title: Ram Charan chooses Mahesh Babu over Prabhas for multistarrer - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan Chooses Mahesh Babu Over Prabhas for Multistarrer

Published on Jan 7, 2025 2:08 pm IST

In an upcoming episode of Unstoppable with NBK S4, Ram Charan reveals his preference for Mahesh Babu over Prabhas when asked to pick a co-star for a multistarrer film.

  • Ram Charan chose Mahesh Babu for a potential multistarrer despite initially struggling with the choice.
  • The episode features discussions about Ram Charan's professional and personal life.
  • Charan's new movie, Game Changer, directed by Shankar Shanmugam, is set to release soon.
“I would choose Mahesh Babu if the opportunity arose.” - Ram Charan

Fans eagerly await more insights from Charan's interview, which will be accessible on Aha tomorrow.

item.title: Theatre actor Alok Chatterjee dies, Swanand Kirkire remembers Irrfan Khan's NSD batchmate: Ek nayaab abhineta chala gaya - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Theatre Actor Alok Chatterjee Passes Away, Remembered by Swanand Kirkire

Date: Jan 07, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Alok Chatterjee, a renowned theatre actor and gold medalist from the National School of Drama, passed away on January 6, 2025. His last rites are scheduled to be held on January 7. He was a prominent figure in Indian theatre and a beloved friend of late actor Irrfan Khan.

  • Alok Chatterjee died due to multiple organ failure at the age of 64.
  • Swanand Kirkire shared a heartfelt note on Instagram, remembering Alok as a unique actor.
  • Alok was a gold medalist at the National School of Drama (NSD) and directed several significant plays.
  • He was known for his contributions to Indian cinema and theatre, having taught at NSD and FTII.
“Alok Chatterjee.. ek nayaab abhineta chala gaya! Woh NSD mein Irrfan ke batchmate the (A unique actor is gone! He was Irfan's batchmate in NSD.)” - Swanand Kirkire

Alok Chatterjee's death marks a great loss for the theatre community, reflecting the profound impact he had on his colleagues and students alike.

item.title: Salman Khan's Galaxy Apartment gets upgraded with bulletproof glass amid threats - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Salman Khan Upgrades Security with Bulletproof Glass Following Threats

Date: Jan 07, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Following a shooting incident at his residence, Bollywood actor Salman Khan has enhanced the security of his Galaxy Apartments in Mumbai by installing bulletproof glass and modern security systems.

  • Salman Khan's residence was shot at by two men on April 14, 2024, leading him to suspect gangster Lawrence Bishnoi.
  • The upgrades include bulletproof glass, high-resolution CCTV cameras, and a modern security system.
  • The attack was believed to be an assassination attempt against Khan and his family.
  • Salman Khan has a history of threats from Lawrence Bishnoi, stemming from a past legal case involving Blackbucks.
  • Recent escalations include the murder of Baba Siddique, a politician with close ties to Khan.
“This incident marks a serious escalation in the threats made by the Bishnoi gang against the actor.”

The improvements to Salman Khan's home highlight the need for enhanced security measures for public figures facing serious threats.

item.title: Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 1: Ram Charan Might Struggle To Meet Opening Of His Bollywood Debut Released 11 Years Ago? - Koimoi
item.description:
Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 1: Ram Charan Might Struggle To Meet Opening Of His Bollywood Debut

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: Koimoi

The Hindi-dubbed release of the film "Game Changer" may fail to match the box office numbers of Ram Charan’s earlier Bollywood debut, causing concerns for its performance.

  • Game Changer to release nationwide on January 10, 2025.
  • The film struggles to generate pre-release buzz, potentially affecting box office earnings.
  • Ram Charan's debut collaboration with director Shankar follows a series of delays since its announcement in February 2021.
  • Comparative analysis shows the Hindi opening could be as low as 2-3 crores, trailing behind the 3.50 crore opening of Zanjeer.
"In a worst-case scenario, it might even struggle to earn what Ram Charan’s Bollywood debut earned at the Indian box office on day 1."

The film's performance is being closely watched as it could impact Ram Charan's standing in the Hindi film market.

item.title: Ram Charan reveals details about Akira Nandan’s movie debut - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan reveals details about Akira Nandan’s movie debut

Published on Jan 7, 2025 by 123Telugu

The highly anticipated film Game Changer featuring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani is set to release on January 10, 2025. Ram Charan recently discussed the film and Akira Nandan's debut on the show Unstoppable with NBK S4.

  • Ram Charan and Shankar Shanmugam collaborate on the pan-Indian film Game Changer.
  • The movie is scheduled for release on January 10, 2025.
  • Charan teased details about Akira Nandan’s debut amid high public anticipation.
  • Fans will need to tune in on January 8, 2025, to catch more details during his appearance on Unstoppable with NBK S4.
“Stay tuned for more details about Akira Nandan’s debut!”

With excitement building for Akira's debut, fans look forward to the details that will unfold on the upcoming episode.

item.title: Trade experts predict that Hrithik Roshan-Jr NTRs War 2 can be the BIGGEST hit of 2025; also place their bets on Salman Khans Sikandar: The response to its teaser is very encouraging - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Trade Experts Predict Hrithik Roshan-Jr NTR’s War 2 to Be the Biggest Hit of 2025

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Bollywood Hungama

With 2024 ending on a disappointing note, trade experts are optimistic about 2025, unanimously predicting that War 2 will be the biggest hit of the year.

  • Hrithik Roshan and Jr NTR star in War 2, directed by Ayan Mukerji.
  • Taran Adarsh expressed excitement about the film, highlighting the collaboration of the two leading actors.
  • Trade analyst Atul Mohan mentioned that Chhava could also surprise audiences, alongside a positive response for Sikandar’s teaser.
  • Distributors noted the promising teaser for Sikandar, but still expect War 2 to outperform it.
Taran Adarsh: “I am looking forward to War 2. Two actors, whom I rate very highly, are coming together.”

While anticipation is building for a better year, concerns about fewer film releases persist. However, optimism circles around achieving better box office numbers in 2025.

item.title: Chahat Pandey CONFIRMS her relationship & being ENGAED amid her mother's 21 Lakh cash price announcement? - India Forums
item.description:
Chahat Pandey Confirms Engagement Amid Mother's 21 Lakh Cash Challenge

Published: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 at 6:49 AM

Chahat Pandey, a contestant on Bigg Boss 18, has stirred discussions about her relationship status following her mother's claim of offering 21 Lakh rupees to anyone who finds her a boyfriend. Amidst her mother's statements, a video suggests Chahat may be engaged.

  • Chahat's mother claimed she will pay anyone who finds her daughter a boyfriend 21 Lakh rupees.
  • A video shows Chahat hinting towards her engagement by referencing her ring finger.
  • She denied having a boyfriend, yet contradicting evidence has surfaced.
  • Netizens are engaging heavily, asking for the cash prize.
“Nahi, jaan bujhkar bola. Bata ne ka mann kiya mera.”

The unfolding scenario raises questions about Chahat's true relationship status and public perception of her mother's remarks.

item.title: Who is Simar Bhatia? Akshay Kumar’s niece set to make Bollywood debut opposite Agastya Nanda in Ikkis - The Indian Express
item.description:
Who is Simar Bhatia? Akshay Kumar’s niece set to make Bollywood debut opposite Agastya Nanda in Ikkis

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: The Indian Express

Simar Bhatia is set to make her Bollywood debut in Sriram Raghavan’s Ikkis, while receiving heartfelt support from her uncle, Akshay Kumar.

  • Akshay Kumar congratulated Simar, expressing pride in her achievement.
  • Simar is the daughter of Akshay's sister, Alka Bhatia, and has gained attention on social media.
  • She is set to star alongside Agastya Nanda in the film, which is about the 1971 Indo-Pak war hero, Arun Khetarpal.
  • The film is expected to be released later this year.
“The sky is yours.” - Akshay Kumar

Simar's journey into Bollywood marks an exciting new chapter, and she aims to make a significant impact.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Rajat publicly apologizes to Savi at Sai's birthday party - India Forums
item.description:
Rajat's Public Apology to Savi at Sai's Birthday Bash

Published: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 at 6:29 AM

In the latest episode of "Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin," tensions rise as Rajat navigates his feelings of betrayal and guilt towards Savi following a misunderstanding orchestrated by Arsh.

  • Rajat feels manipulated by a fake video involving Savi and decides to flee to Singapore.
  • Savi discovers the truth, but in a moment of anger, signs divorce papers.
  • A tragic accident puts Savi in a critical condition, leading Rajat to reflect on their relationship.
  • During Sai's birthday party, Rajat publicly apologizes to Savi, showcasing his commitment to her well-being.
  • The family dynamics are tested as Savi remains distant despite Rajat's efforts to reconcile.
Shantanu tells Rajat: "Savi gave up her dream of becoming an IAS officer due to her life's struggles."

This episode leaves viewers eagerly anticipating how Rajat and Savi's relationship will evolve amidst ongoing family tensions and personal struggles.

item.title: Baby John actress joins the cast of G2 - 123telugu
item.description:
Bollywood Actress Wamiqa Gabbi Joins G2 Cast

Publication Date: Not specified Source: 123telugu.com

The much-anticipated sequel G2 to the 2018 hit Goodachari is making headlines again as it is currently in production.

  • Wamiqa Gabbi has been confirmed as the female lead.
  • The film is directed by Vinay Kumar Sirigineedi.
  • Other cast members include Adivi Sesh, Emraan Hashmi, Madhu Shalini, and Prakash Raj.
  • The music for the film is composed by Sricharan Pakala.
  • G2 is set to deliver impressive scale, budget, and storytelling.
“G2 promises to deliver grandeur in terms of scale, budget, content, and storytelling.”

With Wamiqa Gabbi's addition to the cast, excitement continues to build for the release of G2 later this year.

item.title: Pushpa 2 APTS Box Office Analysis: Allu Arjun film is a massive BLOCKBUSTER - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Pushpa 2 APTS Box Office Analysis: Allu Arjun film is a massive BLOCKBUSTER

Updated on Jan 07, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Pushpa 2 ranks as the second highest-grossing film of all time in the Telugu states of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana with a total gross of Rs. 339 crore to date.

  • The film is projected to close at Rs. 342 crore as its run comes to an end with upcoming releases.
  • The performance in different box office divisions varies, with the film doing particularly well in the Ceded region.
  • Despite high earnings, there is criticism regarding its performance perception based on distributor recovery instead of gross numbers.
“Pushpa 2 is a MASSive BLOCKBUSTER.”

The film's release has sparked discussions regarding box office metrics, emphasizing the difference between gross income and distributor recovery.

item.title: Angry Shark Tank India pitcher tells Anupam Mittal to stop making ‘befaltu excuses’ if he doesn’t want to invest, advises Peyush Bansal - The Indian Express
item.description:
Gauri Varma's Confect Pitch Sparks Tensions on Shark Tank India

Date & Source: January 2025, Indian Express

The fourth season of Shark Tank India kicked off with stark disagreements among judges regarding Gauri Varma’s pitch for her confectionery brand, Confect. The entrepreneur sought Rs 1 crore for 1% equity, which ignited a debate over her business strategies.

  • Gauri Varma pitched her brand, Confect, asking for Rs 1 crore in exchange for 1% equity.
  • There was a heated argument between judges Anupam Mittal and Namita Thapar about Gauri's honesty.
  • Gauri shared her backstory involving her wedding cake, which inspired her business venture.
  • Peyush advised Gauri to focus on perfecting her product before expanding her range.
  • Anupam raised concerns over her tendency to shift focus, particularly from India to the US market.
  • Namita made an offer of Rs 1 crore for 2% equity with a royalty condition, which Gauri accepted.
“Your superpower has a dark side that doesn’t let you learn from failures.” - Vineeta Singh

The pitch highlights the varied perspectives of investors and their impact on entrepreneurial decisions, setting the stage for intense debates in the reality series.
